paragraphs: I built my personal website using a modern and robust technology stack, creating a dynamic, performant and visually engaging platform to showcase my work and connect with visitors.

sections.subtitle: Motivation and Goals
paragraphs: In my experience as a software engineer, the desire to build a space that truly encapsulates my professional journey, achievements and the spectrum of projects I've passionately worked on led me to design and launch this very site. It was to be a showcase of some of my more recent and favorite work, offering a window for peers, potential collaborators and the curious to explore the work that fuels my joy for this field.

sections.subtitle: Final Thoughts
paragraphs: Each tool played a pivotal role in bringing my vision to life, enabling me to design a responsive site that stands as a dynamic portfolio of my work and a bridge to connect with visitors from around the world. I’m so grateful that you’ve taken the time to learn more about my site!

text.technologyStackIntro: I chose this stack to leverage a modern, highly performant and developer-friendly ecosystem that ensures ultra fast development, easy maintenance and seamless deployment.
